channel.title: CVE Feed for wpexpertsio -- Email Templates Customizer and Designer for WordPress and WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpexpertsio -- Email Templates Customizer and Designer for WordPress and WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2022-47181|2024-08-03T14:47:29.463Z -- wpexpertsio -- email%20templates%20customizer%20and%20designer%20for%20wordpress%20and%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in wpexpertsio Email Templates Customizer and Designer for WordPress and WooCommerce email-templates allows Cross Site Request Forgery.This issue affects Email Templates Customizer and Designer for WordPress and WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.4.2.
